title: Eastern Railway FC
text:
Eastern Railway Football Club is an Indian institutional <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Kolkata">Kolkata</a>, <a href="West%20Bengal">West Bengal</a>, that competes in the <a href="Calcutta%20Football%20League">Calcutta Football League</a>.
History.
Eastern Railway has played in many top tournaments in India like the <a href="IFA%20Shield">IFA Shield</a> where they won the then top tournament in 1944. They have also won the <a href="Calcutta%20Football%20League">Calcutta Football League</a> in 1958. The club used to also be a force in the <a href="Durand%20Cup">Durand Cup</a>, making it into the finals of the 1927 tournament. They also won the <a href="Bordoloi%20Trophy">Bordoloi Trophy</a> in 1967.
The club has been represented by many former <a href="India%20national%20football%20team">India</a> members including <a href="Sahu%20Mewalal">Sahu Mewalal</a> and <a href="Pradip%20Kumar%20Banerjee">Pradip Kumar Banerjee</a>.
